## TAgent type

Utility type for constructing agent type that has a list of available methods

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TAgent<T extends IPluginMethodMap> = {
    [P in keyof T]: RemoveContext<T[P]>;
} & IAgent;
```
